title: I'm feeling seriously depressed
body:
Because of alot of things

I don't want to get into the nitty gritty so instead does anyone have any way to like, IDK, feel better? Something involving or not involving leagues? I don't want to go out and play an MMO because I feel it would take too long to really get into it.

Guess i'll edit this in since someone earlier said its probably worth mentioning here, I have Asperger's and been diagnosed since I was 4.
